title: Soooooo... explain this to me guys?
body: Soooo whats happening here? not sure about you but i understood that only 1 keystone mastery was allowed...

replies.body:
There is currently a "bug" where if you change masteries in the last few seconds before loading screen it will show up as the previous one you had selected.
So this guy had thunderlord's, swapped to deathfire right before loading screen, but still shows ingame as thunderlord's (he doesn't get the bonus damage / effects of it though, just the visual display).
nah, are you sure? because 'Clarity' is huge to riot and something like showing the completely wrong source of damage, isn't something they would let slide.

Yes I'm sure, there was a post on reddit about it the other day. Everything on reddit is 110% truth.
(But in all seriousness, yes I've tested it lol)
ah ok, i had it happen again today so its definitely something established then, and not a 1 time glitch.
hax m8 he has them hax
